long_description: The URBANEARS Plattan Headphones/Medis Earbuds deliver the best of both worlds: big sound and padded comfort with the Plattan headphones, along with minimalist Medis earbuds for low-profile use. Plattan Headphones start with classic headphone design, and then take it above and beyond the ordinary with rich sound, full-size comfort and fold-down mobility. 47 in. fabric cord is durable and tangle-resistant; 3.5mm stereo plug is compatible with all standard 3.5mm music players and phones. Zoundplug jack on the earcap allows a friend to plug in and enjoy your music with you. URBANEARS Plattan Headphones come with a microphone and remote that are compatible with unprotected 3.5mm standard devices such as iPhone(R) and Android. Medis Earbuds take the cake when it comes to remaining firmly in place; with an almost nonexistent level of pressure, these earbuds offer supreme comfort. Dynamic sounds and sleek, minimalist design are sure to make these earbuds an instant favorite. Patented EarClick design positions the earbuds securely and comfortably in your ear by leveraging the bottom of the ear; 4 sizes of silicone pads offer a perfect fit. Earbuds rest a short distance from your ear canal, helping you maintain your sense of balance. URBANEARS Medis Earbuds feature a tangle-resistant cord with a 3.5mm stereo plug.
short_description: The URBANEARS Plattan Headphones/Medis Earbuds deliver the best of both worlds: big sound and padded comfort with the Plattan headphones, along with minimalist Medis earbuds for low-profile use.
